amendatorysection.catchline: Political subdivision; building; use as polling place; when.
amendatorysection.para: A political subdivision which receives federal or state funds and owns or leases a building which is suitable for a polling place shall make the building available to the election commissioner or county clerk for use as a polling place in any election which involves the precinct in which the building is located. The political subdivision shall not charge for the use of the building as a polling place.
